pageContent:
Madhusudhan R Kallem 
Lead Oracle Cloud HCM Techno Functional Consultant                                    
Mobile: 1 (503)- 884 - 5544   
Email: madhuk3618@gmail.com 
Location: Dallas, TX 
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/madhu-k-19b70a274 
 
Over all 13 plus years of world class professional experience in the Oracle Cloud 
HCM and HRMS implementations for the clients located across the Globe primarily 
in  US,  Australia,  and  India.  Involved  in  various Development, Client 
Interactions, Process Improvement activities both from Offshore and Onsite. 
 
Involved in discovery and introductory sessions, requirement discussions, design, 
redesigns,  process  flows,  CRP’s,  development, UAT’s,  dry  runs,  testing, 
customizations,   integrations,   investigation,   RCA’s,   re-design,   reverse 
engineering,  conversions,  technical  and  functional  documentation,  workbooks, 
test  scripts,  user  guides/training,  audit,  periodical  upgrade  and  release

engineering,  conversions,  technical  and  functional  documentation,  workbooks, 
test  scripts,  user  guides/training,  audit,  periodical  upgrade  and  release 
management, migrations, enhancements, change requests, production migrations and 
post go live support. 
 
Completing 5 full life cycle implementations for various domain clients across 
in both functional and technical areas of Global HR, Absence, Individual and 
Work Force Compensation, Talent, ORC, Benefits and OTL.  
 
Experienced in reading and understanding the various clients’ legacy systems, 
practices, performing the fit and gap. As Is & To Be analysis and providing the 
appropriate solutions and implementations in the new Oracle cloud HCM conversions 
projects by working with the various legacy system leads, system and providing 
the best Oracle HCM solutions and meeting the deadlines in record time for any 
given complex issues across the Oracle Cloud HCM modules.

the best Oracle HCM solutions and meeting the deadlines in record time for any 
given complex issues across the Oracle Cloud HCM modules. 
 
Technically  expertise in  mass  data  loads  (HDL,  HCM  SSL,),  reports  (BIP  SQL 
reports and OTBI reports and dashboards), integrations (custom and seeded HCM 
extracts, third party Integrations, rest API’s, BIP interfaces, MuleSoft, MFT 
and  OIC interfaces),  customizations,  personalization’s,  mobile  app, self-
service, BPM approval workflows and securities.  
 
Excellent leadership, communication, interpersonal and problem-solving skills, 
excel in interacting with the project team members, on-time deliveries, multi-
tasking, and effective working in fast-paced environments. Known for being highly 
organized and detail oriented. 
 
 
Technical: HCM Extracts, FBL, HDL, PBL, SSL, Fast Formulas, BIP/OTBI, Security, 
Customizations, Personalization’s.  
Functional: Core HR, Absence, Talent, Compensation, Payroll, ORC and Benefits.

Technical: HCM Extracts, FBL, HDL, PBL, SSL, Fast Formulas, BIP/OTBI, Security, 
Customizations, Personalization’s.  
Functional: Core HR, Absence, Talent, Compensation, Payroll, ORC and Benefits. 
Applications & Database: EBS, Cloud Fusion, Toad, SQL dev, Office Suite (Excel, 
Word & PowerPoint,) JIRA, HP ALM, Service Now, TALEO, Toad, OIM, OAM, Security 
Console, FBL, SSL, HCM, PBL, HCM Extracts, and BPM. 
Languages & Methodologies: SQL, PL/SQL, HTML, Agile/Scrum, AIM and OUM. 
Education: Bachelor’s in electronic & Communications   –    JNTU University 
Certifications: Implementation  Specialist  in  Oracle  Cloud  HCM  Core  HR, 
Absence, Compensation, Talent and Benefits modules.

Career History: 
 
Client: TJX Companies.                                            Framingham, MA
                                                 
Role: Oracle HCM Consultant                                   Oct ‘21 – Current 
Responsibilities: The TJX Companies, Inc. is an American multinational off-price 
department store corporation having more than 300k employee count and involved 
in huge Oracle suit implementation. Assisted in all the HCM techno functional 
activities across the modules including Global HR, Talent, Absence, Benefits, 
BPM Workflows, Updates/Upgrades, Migrations, HCM Extracts, Custom Reports and 
Design changes. 
• Prepared and led familiarization sessions for HR and Comp for the large and 
diversified business users. 
• Opportunity to design Security tasks in Release 23C and secure signoffs for 
custom roles. 
• Involved  in  requirements  gathering  sessions,  design  review  sessions  and 
initial cycle validation sessions.

custom roles.

the  conversion  issues  related  to  the business  units,  salary  basis  and 
workforce structures. 
• Involved  in  design  sessions  with  Auditors,  Hyperion  budget  distribution 
departments and Compensation Managers to provide alternative solutions to 
fill the gaps on product limitations. 
• Prepared the validation test scripts and supported the UAT users (the first 
contact to do the initial testing and data validations, SITs in all the HR, 
Benefits, and payroll transactions. 
• Support Test Automation Solution Planning and Estimation. Analyse current 
architecture  and  test  platforms  to  formulate  a  vision  for  growth  and 
expansion. 
• Worked on unique individual (Sign on bonus, bonus, shift, overtime off cycle

architecture  and  test  platforms  to  formulate  a  vision  for  growth  and 
expansion. 
• Worked on unique individual (Sign on bonus, bonus, shift, overtime off cycle 
promotions, charity contributions, performance appraisals and individual’s 
ESOPs etc.). 
• Worked  on  setting  up  and maintaining the  Benefit  programs,  plans,  plan 
types, options, eligibility profiles, and yearly loading rates. Managed the 
medical  and  life  insurance  level  plan  changes.  Involved  in  complex  fast 
formulas, coverage, variable, UTD, rate, and life event setups. 
• Worked   with   Oracle   customer   satisfaction   managers,   implementation 
specialists and Oracle internal teams for complex design solutions. 
• Optimised utilisation of Oracle support, Enhancement, and service request 
resolutions. 
• Worked on department wise custom security roles for Employee and Line Manger 
privileges. 
• Worked on profile rating models, review periods, questions and questioner

resolutions. 
• Worked on department wise custom security roles for Employee and Line Manger 
privileges. 
• Worked on profile rating models, review periods, questions and questioner 
templates also implemented annual performance process flow. 
• Got opportunity to work on profile content, Goals, Questionnaire, Overall 
Summary, Worker, and Managerial Final Feedback.

• Involved  and coordinated conversion  issues  with  the  offshore  Oracle  GSD 
technical  teams  in  building  complex  Fast  Formulas  and  data  loading 
activities with SSI connect tool extractions for one-time extractions. 
 
• Setup  programs,  plan  types,  plans  for  medical,  supplemental  and  COBRA 
benefits. 
• Support and maintain Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS) testing while 
maximizing  the  effectiveness  of  HR  business  operations.  Identify  and 
document test scenarios and build test cases. 
• Setup plan changes as ending the existing no offered plan and migrating the 
enrolled employees with dependents to newly offered plan and Set-up employee 
self-service to for updating employee personal data on-line. 
• Worked on setting up of Work Structures - Location, Organization, Job, Grade 
in HR, and discoverer reports for Comp and OAB.

self-service to for updating employee personal data on-line.

Client: Ironwood Pharmaceuticals.                                    Boston, MA                                                
Role: Oracle HCM Consultant                                   Feb ‘18 to Oct ‘21 
Responsibilities: Worked as third-party contractor and involved in client facing 
role and led the HCM implementation team and assisted in the acquisitions and 
demerger  projects  for  the  client.  Primarily involved  in several  technical 
activities including creating reports, interfaces, mass data loads across the 
modules. 
• Worked as Oracle functional consultant as part of Oracle HCM implementation 
for Oracle Core HR, CWB, Absence, Performance and Succession. 
• Worked on complex absence plan types with the incremental loading of accrual

for Oracle Core HR, CWB, Absence, Performance and Succession. 
• Worked on complex absence plan types with the incremental loading of accrual 
plans and custom certification requirements for action items. 
• Development of HDL inbound Zip file which includes the different Business 
Objects data files and Unit test the load data in test instance. 
• Create HCM extracts  to  generate  different  assignment  files  for  outbound 
interface to the third-party systems.  
• Performed  detailed  test  designs  using  sound  software  test  engineering 
principles  in  the  context  of  test  automation  platforms  and  integration 
across distributed systems. 
• Drafted large number of test scripts for HR, Payroll and integrations and 
executed  the  test  scripts  in  various  environments  and  pushed  the 
implementation team on redesigns for any critical issues. 
• Worked on Functional Setup Manager in Test Sandbox Instance and tested the 
different assigned tasks of Core HR & Payroll.

implementation team on redesigns for any critical issues. 
• Worked on Functional Setup Manager in Test Sandbox Instance and tested the 
different assigned tasks of Core HR & Payroll.  
• Coordination with the Web Services team to create web services to automate 
the export of data to downstream systems (for both HR and non-HR) and import 
data to update fields into Cloud HCM and Setting the details of HCM Data 
Loader Scope parameters.  
• Involved in conducting CRP1, CRP2, test data preparation and test scenario 
preparation. 
• Gather requirements from the business users document the requirements and 
initiate the development process after requirement sign-off.

• Modify  existing  third-party  vendor  interfaces  and  develop  new  vendor 
interfaces as required. 
• Identify  the  changes  that  need  to  be  incorporated  in  each  release  and 
coordinate  with  change  management  and  release  management  teams  during 
deployment. 
• Implementation and support for Oracle core HRMS and SSHR modules and HR and 
Comp in Fusion. 
• Worked on Enterprise Structure one-time setups, Geography setups, Workforce 
Structures, ESS/MSS, Security, and approval tasks. 
• Expert in how to use the fields in the Returned Rate Details, Override and 
Defaulting Rules, and Contributor Rules sections. 
• Provided  functional  support  for  creating  employees,  defining  salaries, 
terminate / retire employees, assign grade structure.  
• Gather requirements for Oracle Advanced benefits implementation. Meet with 
users  to  gather  requirements  regarding  various  benefit  plans  including 
medical, dental, HAS and CORBA plans.

• Gather requirements for Oracle Advanced benefits implementation. Meet with 
users  to  gather  requirements  regarding  various  benefit  plans  including 
medical, dental, HAS and CORBA plans.

Responsibilities: Involved  in  multiple  projects  as  part  of  Graks  info Oracle

Fast Formulas, Reports and end to end implementation of Core HR, Absence, Talent 
and Benefits Modules for various clients across UK, US and India.

was focused extensively on the customization of HRMS using People Tools and 
the Reporting Tools.

Development, test, and prod environments. 
• Involved in functional testing, preparing test scenarios, test cases and 
test data for regression and functional test cycles.

production  issues,  build  new  functionality  and  improve  processing  time 
through code optimization.

capital, allowing perform the whole management process of information of an

• Develop SQL and PL/SQL scripts to transfer tables across the schemas and 
databases. 
• Worked with business analyst and developers in setting up test data. 
• Involved  in  the  data  transfer  and  creating  tables  from  various  tables, 
coding using PL/SQL, packages, stored procedures, and triggers.  
 
Client: IT Path India PVT Ltd.            Hyderabad, India                                                
Role: Oracle HCM Consultant          Jan 2015 – Dec 2015 
Responsibilities: Responsible for working on enhancement and production support 
tickets  for  various  clients  as  part  of  IT  Path  implementation,  Requirements

Responsibilities: Responsible for working on enhancement and production support 
tickets  for  various  clients  as  part  of  IT  Path  implementation,  Requirements 
Gathering, preparing functional specs, Conversion Design, Test script documents, 
User Manuals and Business Process documents and Cloud HCM conversions. 
• Including IT Path India PVT Ltd, migrated several new and existing clients 
to Oracle HCM and workday from EBS, People Soft, and manual worksheets. 
• Experience in interpreting the salary basis by considering legislative data 
group, frequency of quoted base pay salary, annualization factors, payroll 
element, input values, and currency conversions. 
• Implemented and supported the clients on Compensation, Talent, and Absence 
modules in Oracle EBS and Cloud HCM. 
• Part  of  the  HRIS  ERP  research  project  and  performed  POC’s  and  provided

modules in Oracle EBS and Cloud HCM.

populations, and element mapping setups as per the requirements. 
• Created the annual and quarterly performance templates and integrated the 
same compensation worksheets for performance-related hikes. 
• Configure profile options, Lookups, e-mail notifications, and personnel goal 
plans settings in Oracle Fusion Goal management. 
• Implemented  end  to  end  performance  and  goal  management  and  extensively 
worked on adding and editing the goals, setting the status of goals, and 
deciding the accessibility of goals. 
• Worked on Goal Types, review periods, Multiple goal plans and plans sets

• Configured  tree hierarchies  for  the  reporting  and  security  purpose  and

Self-services.

field task to configure the structure for legislative data group.
